hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Get in touch with us. We'd love to hear from you and help with any questions about Kaluwala.

hours.title: Visit Hours
hours.note: Open all days of the year

directions.title: How to Reach
directions.description: Kaluwala is accessible by road from major cities in Uttarakhand.

routes.description: Take NH-7 towards Rishikesh, then follow signs to Kaluwala via Jollygrant.
Take the Rishikesh-Dehradun road, continue to Ranipokri and then to Kaluwala.

contactForm.title: Send us a Message
contactForm.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

seo.title: Contact Us | Kaluwala
seo.description: Get in touch with Kaluwala. Find our location, contact details, and how to reach our beautiful village in Uttarakhand.
